The Story of Film: An Odyssey is an inclusive and ground-breaking journey through the history of world cinema and a treat for movie lovers around the globe. Guided by filmmaker and historian Mark Cousins, this wonderfully insightful 15-hour love letter to the movies begins with the invention of motion pictures at the end of the 19th century, continuing through the entire 20th century of moviemaking and concluding with the globalized digital industry of the 21st. In The Story of Film: A New Generation, Cousins picks up where Odyssey left off, returning with a new epic and hopeful tale of modern cinematic innovation in the new millennium, exploring how movies and moviegoing have evolved and will continue to transform to our collective joy and wonder.","popularity":1.845,"poster_path":"/bJw6vLP9KsSeO3W8iYPNurO3bLu.jpg","release_date":"2023-08-29","title":"The Complete Story of Film","video":false,"vote_average":8.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/df0dsIgLIwZ0ofoTP611o5MgTY5.jpg","genre_ids":[99],"id":1185436,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Against the Grain","overview":"A glimpse at how genre film-focused home video companies have taken the charge in preserving, restoring, and releasing so many works which otherwise might have been lost to time.","popularity":2.615,"poster_path":"/7FyqYunKPIn4GyT12hev642XyEj.jpg","release_date":"2023-11-24","title":"Against the Grain","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/otCCPSoJnR4d0MtXzu3hdc6XOvr.jpg","genre_ids":[99],"id":565591,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Memory: The Origins of Alien","overview":"The untold origin story behind Ridley Scott's Alien - rooted in Greek and Egyptian mythologies, underground comics, the art of Francis Bacon, and the dark visions of Dan O'Bannon and H.R. Giger. A contemplation on the symbiotic collaborative process of movie-making, the power of myth, and our collective unconscious.","popularity":6.614,"poster_path":"/bsLijGBQgJCLh5TpWNTubNzkYGu.jpg","release_date":"2019-01-24","title":"Memory: The Origins of Alien","video":false,"vote_average":6.2,"vote_count":80},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/yOQw88bkHYSD4Rj5habj77T219L.jpg","genre_ids":[99],"id":722624,"original_language":"en","original_title":"The True Adventures of Raoul Walsh","overview":"This is the first feature-length documentary on legendary director Raoul Walsh. In this 'memoir,' Walsh 'recounts' his career from the silent film era to the tumultuous 1960s. The documentary makes stunning use of rare, personal and production photos and footage, revealing Walsh's extraordinary, adventurous life on and off the set. From his apprenticeship with D.W. Griffith to his discovery of John Wayne and Rock Hudson, from the innovative 'The Thief of Bagdad' (1924) to the widescreen 'The Big Trail' (1930), from his classic work with Cagney, Bogart and Flynn to his mastery of every genre (musicals, comedies, Westerns, gangster, war), Walsh made Hollywood history. His life is nothing less than the story of Hollywood itself. Here's a full-bodied account of one of Hollywood's greatest legends.","popularity":4.369,"poster_path":"/4LZJiu2F8g8Nu7iZcaNCRuwKYxV.jpg","release_date":"2014-09-30","title":"The True Adventures of Raoul Walsh","video":false,"vote_average":7.3,"vote_count":3},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/ctQXNHFmnQL5LPhjc9KlNwMu5CW.jpg","genre_ids":[99],"id":24479,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Look, Up in the Sky! The Amazing Story of Superman","overview":"The history of the comic book superhero, Superman, in his various media incarnations.","popularity":6.776,"poster_path":"/njxYrHZYfYHQ1gia19t2Nt5Bxfp.jpg","release_date":"2006-06-12","title":"Look, Up in the Sky! The Amazing Story of Superman","video":false,"vote_average":7.4,"vote_count":24},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/iCHhFi4JhGtgnOUKL8xqGmXXU7E.jpg","genre_ids":[99],"id":257147,"original_language":"cn","original_title":"無涯：杜琪峯的電影世界","overview":"As Hong Kong's foremost filmmaker, Johnnie To himself becomes the protagonist of this painstaking documentary exploring him and his Boundless world of film. A film student from Beijing and avid Johnnie To fan, Ferris Lin boldly approached To with a proposal to document the master director for his graduation thesis. To agreed immediately and Lin's camera closely followed him for over two years, capturing the man behind the movies and the myths. The result is Boundless, a candid profile of one of Hong Kong's greatest directors and a heartfelt love letter to Hong Kong cinema.","popularity":9.473,"poster_path":"/zPHKFeyKQn5R9zDNr8oQ46cXyr4.jpg","release_date":"2013-11-02","title":"Boundless","video":false,"vote_average":7.5,"vote_count":10},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/6WleKGryFv038LEj0Z1KvP8I09q.jpg","genre_ids":[99],"id":21189,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Lost in La Mancha","overview":"Fulton and Pepe's 2000 documentary captures Terry Gilliam's attempt to get The Man Who Killed Don Quixote off the ground. Back injuries, freakish storms, and more zoom in to sabotage the project.","popularity":9.173,"poster_path":"/gPlWNmQOzJ7j8djCxXcc40syVS3.jpg","release_date":"2002-02-11","title":"Lost in La Mancha","video":false,"vote_average":7.0,"vote_count":210},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/kJoxU6OF4SBACVUES8one1QfnNR.jpg","genre_ids":[99,10402],"id":230864,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Marvin Hamlisch: What He Did For Love","overview":"When Marvin Hamlisch passed away in August 2012 the worlds of music, theatre and cinema lost a talent the likes of which we may never see again. Seemingly destined for greatness, Hamlisch was accepted into New York’s Juilliard School as a 6-year-old musical prodigy and rapidly developed into a phenomenon. With instantly classic hits ‘The Way We Were’ and ‘Nobody Does It Better’ and scores for Hollywood films such as The Swimmer, The Sting and Sophie’s Choice and the Broadway juggernaut A Chorus Line; Hamlisch became the go-to composer for film and Broadway producers and a prominent presence on the international Concert Hall circuit. His streak was staggering, vast, unprecedented and glorious, by the age of 31 Hamlisch had won 4 Grammys, an Emmy, 3 Oscars, a Tony and a Pulitzer prize: success that burned so bright, it proved impossible to match.","popularity":5.176,"poster_path":"/sW5KNObsL9xFPQEuuSPqNvIAsI.jpg","release_date":"2013-10-12","title":"Marvin Hamlisch: What He Did For Love","video":false,"vote_average":9.0,"vote_count":4},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":244174,"original_language":"de","original_title":"Dem Panzerkreuzer Potemkin auf der Spur","overview":"Documentary detailing the extensive number of shots long lost from constant film re-cutting of 1925's great silent cinema classic Battleship Potemkin in the last 80 years, and how many of those shots have been returned.","popularity":2.737,"poster_path":null,"release_date":"2007-09-26","title":"Tracing Battleship Potemkin","video":false,"vote_average":6.0,"vote_count":4},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/sKqMQ9ZDjEdARgS62dsqNxHArmZ.jpg","genre_ids":[99,878],"id":617031,"original_language":"en","original_title":"In Search of Tomorrow","overview":"A nostalgic journey through ’80s Sci-Fi-films, exploring their impact and relevance today, told by the artist who made them and by those who were inspired to turn their visions into reality.","popularity":8.518,"poster_path":"/n7tRI2GK1fLnXcmNO8cpFBAtSO2.jpg","release_date":"2022-02-19","title":"In Search of Tomorrow","video":false,"vote_average":6.5,"vote_count":24},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/hSX0QrnYqrzW03yJ3UNN1iWbVdb.jpg","genre_ids":[99],"id":26965,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Star Trek: The Captains' Summit","overview":"The Captains' Summit documents the first time in Star Trek history that four stars who at some point have played Captains in Star Trek (William Shatner, Patrick Stewart, Leonard Nimoy, Jonathan Frakes) have been brought together for a 70-minute rare and unprecedented round table event. Heroes","video":false,"vote_average":6.797,"vote_count":32},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":736349,"original_language":"bg","original_title":"Бинка: Да разкажеш приказка за мълчанието","overview":"A film pioneer, Binka Zhelyazkova was at the forefront of political cinema under Bulgaria's Communist dictatorship. Though she remained faithful to the communist ideals she became an avid critic of the regime and brought upon herself the wrath of its censorship. As a result four of her nine films were shelved and released to the public only after the fall of the regime in 1989, and Binka Zhelyazkova became known as the bad girl of Bulgarian cinema. A provocative portrait that reveals the pressures and complexities that arise when art is made under totalitarianism.","popularity":1.277,"poster_path":"/ztilhByHcBIzWSos13VBFXXI6jG.jpg","release_date":"2007-01-01","title":"Binka: To Tell a Story About Silence","video":false,"vote_average":9.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/bhg1MGVy9gVVH6QlyUDRNxtHdpp.jpg","genre_ids":[10402,99],"id":426410,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Score: A Film Music Documentary","overview":"Music is an integral part of most films, adding emotion and nuance while often remaining invisible to audiences. Matt Schrader shines a spotlight on the overlooked craft of film composing, gathering many of the art form’s most influential practitioners, from Hans Zimmer and Danny Elfman to Quincy Jones and Randy Newman, to uncover their creative process. Tracing key developments in the evolution of music in film, and exploring some of cinema’s most iconic soundtracks, 'Score' is an aural valentine for film lovers.","popularity":16.998,"poster_path":"/hlass0Pq1j6WD6JAucH3mXBoWo4.jpg","release_date":"2017-03-16","title":"Score: A Film Music Documentary","video":false,"vote_average":7.1,"vote_count":108},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/pmvWLzvPYEvzD08tKRBn4g4SWLq.jpg","genre_ids":[99],"id":42981,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Frank and Ollie","overview":"Before computer graphics, special effects wizardry, and out-of-this world technology, the magic of animation flowed from the pencils of two of the greatest animators The Walt Disney Company ever produced -- Frank Thomas and Ollie Johnston. Frank and Ollie, the talent behind BAMBI, PINOCCHIO, LADY AND THE TRAMP, THE JUNGLE BOOK, and others, set the standard for such modern-day hits as THE LION KING. It was their creative genius that helped make Disney synonymous with brilliant animation, magnificent music, and emotional storytelling. Take a journey with these extraordinary artists as they share secrets, insights, and the inspiration behind some of the greatest animated movies the world has ever known!","popularity":7.333,"poster_path":"/eUIELE2IkuWkAc3JzjYz6J2Lpx5.jpg","release_date":"1995-10-20","title":"Frank and Ollie","video":false,"vote_average":7.5,"vote_count":35}],"total_pages":8331,"total_results":166602}
